org.activebpel.rt.bpel.server.engine.recovery
Interface IAeRecoveredItemsSet

All Known Implementing Classes:
AeRecoveredItemsSet
public interface IAeRecoveredItemsSet

Defines the interface for a set of alarm and queue manager items generated during recoverys.

Method Summary
 void addRecoveredItem(IAeRecoveredItem aRecoveredItem)
          Adds the given recovered item to the set and verifies that the set did not already contain a matching item.
 java.util.List getRecoveredItems()
          Returns recovered items as a list.
 IAeRecoveredItem removeRecoveredItem(IAeRecoveredItem aItem)
          Removes and returns the recovered item that matches the given item; returns null if there is no matching item.
 IAeRecoveredItem removeRecoveredItem(int aLocationId)
          Removes and returns the recovered item that matches the given location id; returns null if there is no matching item.
 

Method Detail
